thread.title: Monday's TV pick: Dance Mums With Jennifer Ellison
thread.title_full: Monday's TV pick: Dance Mums With Jennifer Ellison

title: Monday's TV pick: Dance Mums With Jennifer Ellison
text:
Submit Dance Mums With Jennifer Ellison is back for round two with a new series of drama, talent and dancing. Dancer, actress and musical theatre star Jennifer Ellison welcomes her elite dancing protégés and their straight-talking mums to train at her Jelli Studios, which have been newly renovated with state of the art décor. 
© Lifetime As each episode brings challenging routines and competition nerves, there's plenty of heated arguments as it's not just Jennifer's reputation on the line, but her cold hard cash too.Jennifer's recruited the troupe's first boy to give her crew the ultimate edge, but will Harry be what she needs to take her team to the top? Dance Mums With Jennifer Ellison, Lifetime, 9pm
